tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Announcing Your Film Festival
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
The global search for the world's best storytellers.
This is Your Film Festival. You have until March 31st to submit a short, story-driven video. There's no entry fee. It can be any format - short film, web-series episode, TV pilot - and any genre. In June, audiences around the world will vote, sending 10 deserving storytellers to open the 2012 Venice Film Festival where a Grand Prize Winner will be be rewarded with a $500,000 grant to create a new work, produced by Ridley Scott and his world class team.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Programme consisting of a prose or verse composition, resp. one telling a story, written for or as if for performance by actors, puppets or animated

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Your Film Festival Grand Prize Winner Announced Spotlight Following a red carpet screening of the finalist films at the world's oldest film festival in Venice, juror and award-winning actor Michael Fassbender﻿ announced that "The Guilt" by David Victori is the winner of Your Film Festival. David wins $500,000 for his new project on YouTube with the support of Sir Ridley Scott and Fassbender. Presented by: yourfilmfestival
Please check out and﻿ vote for the short film that is one of the semi-finalists - "SOLD" -- If you like it, please vote! :) I really hope the film gets to Venice!!
لايك للي جاي من اليوتيوب :P﻿
no its not a hoax.﻿ ridley scott personally said on a video that hes one of the judges.

I looked through every comment, and no more than a small handful wanted to know the name of the piece. I enjoy just replaying the video so I can listen to the song. It's great, so I wish I knew who & what I﻿ was listening to.

Yay, we finally got some news!
We're thrilled at how many entries we received and need a little bit more time to bring﻿ you the semi-finalists. Check back on June 11th at 4pm PST to start voting for your favorites.

so um wen will the next one be, because i just saw this one and i want to enter next year, also where do we submit the video and if we win how will we get the money lol,﻿ i have a good idea for a file
I submitted my film by the deadline, "Behind the﻿ Veil" :-) please feel free to comment on it!

I entered a short called CHOICES by Kathy Payton. I've just been waiting to hear anything at﻿ all, so I guess it's good news to hear the contest is still on. I'm taking it as hopeful. I mean why not, what else have we got to lose.
Hopefully these guys can give us some update soon...feel free to check out﻿ my﻿ short "ASUNDER" and good luck to everybodys shorts!
guys pause at﻿ 0:54 illuminati and also at 1:00
الله﻿ يشغلكم يا عريببيا
شباب لاححظو﻿ عين ماسونيه في 1:00 < لايك عشان يشوفون
check﻿ it out Turkish Coffee!!!
Yeah me﻿ too =)

Latest update from YFF: "Due to the large number of entries to the Your Film Festival Competition, we have extended our evaluation period to 12th June. Thank you﻿ for your patience and stay tuned to our announcement of the 50 semifinalists on or around that date." This is awesome, starting to get updates, makes this much better!

Questo concorso è un'anomalia: tutti i partecipanti non hanno ricevuto alcuna mail che notificasse l'iscrizione. Possibile che un colosso simile non abbia un sistema automatizzato che risponda: «Grazie per aver partecipato»?. Ora esce fuori un utente che ha iscritto il video l'altro ieri, a iscrizioni chiuse, che ha ricevuto questa famosa notifica. Allora sono io a pensar male o c'è qualcosa che﻿ non va? Domani vedremo questi famosi 50 finalisti (forse) ma i dubbi rimangono. Troppi.
يا امه ضحكت من جهلها﻿ الأمم

Voting starts tomorrow, but I haven't heard anything at all since I submitted my film. No emails or calls, and nothing on youtube...Did they decide not to have the contest after﻿ all?? If not, where can people vote for my movie?
how we can﻿ send our movies to﻿ the festival?

oh shit i just realized, this ends like in september and thats close to december, right? ive heard from different sources that illuminati is begining what﻿ they call "the new world﻿ order" in december, its kinda suspicious, just sayin
El﻿ general
The﻿ name of the instrumental music please =D

This competition is strange: all of the participants have not received any mail that notifies the submission. It is possible that Google/Youtube does not have an automated system﻿ that responds: «Thank you for participating»?. Now gets out a user who has entered the video 1 weeg ago (the submission closed on 31﻿ march) which has received this notification. So am I to think the worst or is there something wrong? Tomorrow we will see these famous 50 finalists (perhaps) but doubts remain. Too many.
is the film festival in the next year,too? And how we can send our movies to the﻿ festival?

Reviewer.School: ähmm Grundschulabschluss xD naja ich möchts abitur bekommen :D
